channel.title: Behance Network Featured Projects
channel.description: The latest projects featured on the Behance Network

item.title: Nine10Eleven
item.description: Mollie and Andrew (an unconventional pair), decided to launch a non-profit organization for kids. Their wedding date was September 10th 2011, so we came up with the idea of naming the organization Nine10Eleven. The event served as both a celebration of their marriage and the launch of Nine10Eleven - with wedding invitations that doubled as the brand identity for the charity. It was important to express Mollie and Andrew's personalities - specifically their love for NYC and classic American rock. We designed the invitation on the back of a 7" record sleeve, printing event details between a track list of Mollie and Andrew's favorite songs. The sleeve contained a vintage vinyl record, a poster that doubled as a map of NYC highlighting their favorite spots, as well as a cheeky RSVP card. For the event itself we created brown paper bags for cocktail hour and late night bagels. All the graphics combined elegant, clean typography with fun, handmade illustrations - which made the experience of unveiling the event through print collateral exciting and unexpected.
item.content:encoded: Mollie and Andrew (an unconventional pair), decided to launch a non-profit organization for kids. Their wedding date was September 10th 2011, so we came up with the idea of naming the organization Nine10Eleven. The event served as both a celebration of their marriage and the launch of Nine10Eleven - with wedding invitations that doubled as the brand identity for the charity. It was important to express Mollie and Andrew's personalities - specifically their love for NYC and classic American rock. We designed the invitation on the back of a 7" record sleeve, printing event details between a track list of Mollie and Andrew's favorite songs. The sleeve contained a vintage vinyl record, a poster that doubled as a map of NYC highlighting their favorite spots, as well as a cheeky RSVP card. For the event itself we created brown paper bags for cocktail hour and late night bagels. All the graphics combined elegant, clean typography with fun, handmade illustrations - which made the experience of unveiling the event through print collateral exciting and unexpected.

item.title: Deiglig Bakeri
item.description: A remix of the traditional French Bakery was the inspiration behind Missions brand identity for Deiglig. With local competition from global convenience stores and premium Patisseries, we aimed to carve out a new position by creating a welcoming place to hang-out for the local student community. In true Mission style we went for a simple solution using one single font (cut in-house), to brand all material. The font was used for messaging throughout the environment to reflect the hospitality of the brand. "The identity, the interior and "Deiglige bakevarer" succeed in giving students and staff at the Fredrikke building an ambience which has brought smiles and laughter to this corner of the the campus." Alain Clérambault CEO Studentkafeene.
item.content:encoded: A remix of the traditional French Bakery was the inspiration behind Missions brand identity for Deiglig. With local competition from global convenience stores and premium Patisseries, we aimed to carve out a new position by creating a welcoming place to hang-out for the local student community. In true Mission style we went for a simple solution using one single font (cut in-house), to brand all material. The font was used for messaging throughout the environment to reflect the hospitality of the brand. "The identity, the interior and "Deiglige bakevarer" succeed in giving students and staff at the Fredrikke building an ambience which has brought smiles and laughter to this corner of the the campus." Alain Clérambault CEO Studentkafeene.

item.title: Jaguar XKX
item.description: The XKX Jaguar is a new generation electric roadster, aimed at pushing both performance and power efficiency to a new level. This concept tries to revive the glorious design lines of the brand, combining fresh solutions, a unique, new aerodynamics, tailored around the electrical elements of the power system as well as cutting-edge energy feedback. Given the fact that the XKX is an electric vehicle, the small dimensions of the engine and flexibility of placement of the battery help a lot with creating better aerodynamics. Air flow is sensibly favored by the large deflectors at the sides of the front intakes; large part of the air flows through them, exits where the door begins, after the front wheels and reenters in the rear intakes, to exit from the big pair of openings at the rear.
item.content:encoded: The XKX Jaguar is a new generation electric roadster, aimed at pushing both performance and power efficiency to a new level. This concept tries to revive the glorious design lines of the brand, combining fresh solutions, a unique, new aerodynamics, tailored around the electrical elements of the power system as well as cutting-edge energy feedback. Given the fact that the XKX is an electric vehicle, the small dimensions of the engine and flexibility of placement of the battery help a lot with creating better aerodynamics. Air flow is sensibly favored by the large deflectors at the sides of the front intakes; large part of the air flows through them, exits where the door begins, after the front wheels and reenters in the rear intakes, to exit from the big pair of openings at the rear.

item.title: MTV "Group Hug"
item.description: Blobs cuddling in a group hug, colouring the grey scenery more and more in pastels and neon with each tender touch, welcome the viewer to a brand new series of international MTV idents starting April 2nd, 2012 around the world (except in the U.S.). This animation spot follows our first station ident for MTV International in July 2011, "Close & Caring", also created and directed by Mate Steinforth.
item.content:encoded: Blobs cuddling in a group hug, colouring the grey scenery more and more in pastels and neon with each tender touch, welcome the viewer to a brand new series of international MTV idents starting April 2nd, 2012 around the world (except in the U.S.). This animation spot follows our first station ident for MTV International in July 2011, "Close & Caring", also created and directed by Mate Steinforth.

item.title: Richard Solomon Artists Rep. Corporate Identity
item.description: Richard Solomon Artists Representative is an Illustration boutique based in New York City that represents 40 artists all over the world. The redesign of their branding image reflects sophistication, elegance and style, which are some of the characteristics that define the group.

item.title: Electronic Sundays
item.description: For almost 20 years, Goa has been the best monthly Sunday party in Madrid. An outstanding selective international music programme and excessive attention to every last detail has been the secret to becoming a classic and a reference. The last rebranding and visual work was done in collaboration with Bartholot, who shot models in his recognizable style, defining the different themes of each party: Naked, Apochalypse, Celebrities, Super Goa, Like a Virgin and Madriz
item.content:encoded: For almost 20 years, Goa has been the best monthly Sunday party in Madrid. An outstanding selective international music programme and excessive attention to every last detail has been the secret to becoming a classic and a reference. The last rebranding and visual work was done in collaboration with Bartholot, who shot models in his recognizable style, defining the different themes of each party: Naked, Apochalypse, Celebrities, Super Goa, Like a Virgin and Madriz

item.title: Insect Traps
item.description: Insect traps explores the digital nature of organic molecules and biological organisms. Virtual insects are injected in closed simulated environments where they fight for their lives against larger than life biomolecular structures.
item.content:encoded: Insect traps explores the digital nature of organic molecules and biological organisms. Virtual insects are injected in closed simulated environments where they fight for their lives against larger than life biomolecular structures.

item.title: ALEXANDER MCQUEEN | PUMA
item.description: A series of five short videos designed for the Alexander McQueen for Puma RAW POWER campaign. Selected from an open call contest hosted on the SHOWstudio site, Supernature was chosen to submit an original concept for a fashion film short that was then shown on the McQueen and Puma websites.
item.content:encoded: A series of five short videos designed for the Alexander McQueen for Puma RAW POWER campaign. Selected from an open call contest hosted on the SHOWstudio site, Supernature was chosen to submit an original concept for a fashion film short that was then shown on the McQueen and Puma websites.

item.title: Transference
item.description: A series of analog images exploring the relationship between collective memory and personal history - using miniature objects frozen in landscapes made of ice - landscapes that, like time and memory, are in flux and slowly disappearing as they melt.
item.content:encoded: A series of analog images exploring the relationship between collective memory and personal history - using miniature objects frozen in landscapes made of ice - landscapes that, like time and memory, are in flux and slowly disappearing as they melt.

item.title: Sisifo for Artemide
item.description: Sisifo, Scott Wilson's new hybrid luminaire for Artemide, challenges this convention with a new typology of light that blends task lamp with table lamp and leverages LEDs qualities to create a new icon in lighting. Wilsons vision was to create a large diffused disk of light that gracefully balances and easily rotates 360 degrees to directa soft, powerful light source. Client: Artemide Completed: 2012 Design Team: Scott Wilson
item.content:encoded: Sisifo, Scott Wilson's new hybrid luminaire for Artemide, challenges this convention with a new typology of light that blends task lamp with table lamp and leverages LEDs qualities to create a new icon in lighting. Wilsons vision was to create a large diffused disk of light that gracefully balances and easily rotates 360 degrees to directa soft, powerful light source. Client: Artemide Completed: 2012 Design Team: Scott Wilson

item.title: The Tattooed Poster a retrospective to 2011
item.description: The Chaos Crew tattoo studio is well known in Munich and far beyond its city limits. We developed a poster that impressively shows the bavarian tattoo artists skills: just as tattoo motives tell countless stories, we interwove the most important events of 2011 into one huge tattoo. History was tattooed onto calfskin to promote the art of tattooing in its most authentic form on real skin. Chaos Crew Tattoo Studio we get history under your skin.
item.content:encoded: The Chaos Crew tattoo studio is well known in Munich and far beyond its city limits. We developed a poster that impressively shows the bavarian tattoo artists skills: just as tattoo motives tell countless stories, we interwove the most important events of 2011 into one huge tattoo. History was tattooed onto calfskin to promote the art of tattooing in its most authentic form on real skin. Chaos Crew Tattoo Studio we get history under your skin.

item.title: CuoreMotore Hyundai. New Thinking. New Possibilities.
item.description: A prize-on-call project to illustrate a concept via poster. We worked on a paper object whose shape was a mixture of a heart and an engine, projecting the payoff on it, and taking a shot from the one and only point from which the sentence and its substance were comprhensible.

item.title: The Barbatonics
item.description: the Barbatonics are inhabitants of Sassiland. Each one has a special story to be told, together they are a set of 7 characters designed by Elisa Sassi and digitally sculpted by Quailstudio a.k.a Amaury Lemal. the Barbatonics are the Vinyl Toys that Elisa Sassi has always been dreaming about!! We are working to bring these characters into your home as a collectible series of Vinyl Art Toys. Stay tuned for updates on an upcoming kickstarter project that you can be a part of and help us materialize the Barbatonic dream. Weee! ?( ? ? )
item.content:encoded: the Barbatonics are inhabitants of Sassiland. Each one has a special story to be told, together they are a set of 7 characters designed by Elisa Sassi and digitally sculpted by Quailstudio a.k.a Amaury Lemal. the Barbatonics are the Vinyl Toys that Elisa Sassi has always been dreaming about!! We are working to bring these characters into your home as a collectible series of Vinyl Art Toys. Stay tuned for updates on an upcoming kickstarter project that you can be a part of and help us materialize the Barbatonic dream. Weee! ?( ? ? )
